notesStmt.note: Title from colophon. Probably an alternate title for the Caṇḍograśūlapāṇitantra (see New Cat. Cat.).

Good condition. Orange powder rubbed in over invocation, colophon, some words, and all numbers. Mistakes indicated with two short strokes, covered over with yellow, or blocked out or blotched out with black. Marginal and interlinear corrections in black and blue.

Begins: śrīḥ om̐ asya śrīpratyaṁgirāstotramaṁtrasya mahādeva ṛṣiḥ anuṣṭup chaṁdaḥ pratyaṁgirā devatā huṁ bījaṁ svāhā śaktiḥ mama sarvābhīṣṭasidhyarthe jape viniyogaḥ śrīkubjovāca maṁdarasthaṁ sukhāsīnaṁ bhagavataṁ maheśvaraṁ samupāgamya caraṇau pārvatī paripṛchati 1
Ends (f. 3v): ekāyutaṁ japaṁ kṛtvā trirātrān maraṇaṁ ripoḥ mahājvaro bhavet tasya taptatāmraśalākayā 54 yuddhadvāre pravinyasya saptāhān maraṇaṁ ripoḥ
Colophon (f. 3v): iti śrīcaṁḍeśvaraśūlapāṇitaṁtre bhairavabhairavīsaṁvāde pratyaṁgirāstotraṁ samāptam śubham [Three lines of invocation follow.]
